tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We reached out to Dr. Tina for our newborn baby who wasn’t being discharged from the NICU because they kept telling us that the Glucose levels were low. I sent her all the reports through WhatsApp and she literally understood the urgency and worries I had and assisted her with her opinion right away on call. I insisted on knowing the mode of payment for her consultation but she politely refused and said it’s not a big deal and we can pay when when we visit her. We visited her clinic in a day and she very patiently attended to our worries and worked out on the care plan for the baby that we were most comfortable with, without scaring the heck out of us. Which is extremely rare in my personal experience with doctors in Delhi.  We consulted Dr. Tina for our firstborn for newborn care, and when we decided to have our second, we had no doubts we would continue our journey with her despite moving further away from Dwarka. 
Thank you Doctor!!!! We are blessed to have found you for our babies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Paediatric care,Nutrition in Children,Child specialists ,All Pediatric Problems ,
review: We have been consulting Dr. Tina for our daughter for over 6 yrs now. And we can confidently say that she is one of the best paediatrician. She has got all the good qualities that young parents would want in their child's doctor. She is - patient, she will give you time, she will explain the problem, she will never cause panic and the best and the most important thing... she will provide you the right treatment and nutrition advice. And she is always a phone call away. We are blessed to have found her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ****** ** **** *** ******* not recommending this doctor to anyone. This feedback is from my personal experience. My 2 year baby was unwell and he was crying when we visited the doctor may be uncomfortable in front of stranger or may be because he was unwell. She reacted weirdly as she didn't liked the noise of crying baby. ** *** ** ******* ** ********* ** *** ***** ** ****** **** **** ** ********** ** *** ***** ***** ******** ** *********. Although I never get good vibes nor any satisfactory response from her but since my baby was crying with stomach pain so in emergency situation we went to see her as Shyama hospital is very close to my house.

context: Autism Spectrum disorders Treatment,Child Development Disease Treatment,
review: As only pedia I find her good but it was told that she is a development pedia which I guess she is not because she referred me to Psychiatrist without doing any specific assessment. It seems like giving way of earning to another doc because she was ready with vsiying card. May I am wrong  and pray that she understood our concern and that Psychiatrist will help us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I love the way she handles the kids , i prefer doctors which give hassle free treatments , she is just an apt doctor if you are looking for someone who is polite , honest ,kind, and is understanding , always relives my worries in respect to my kid , so happy  with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** ********** ************** patient and polite. She is my son’s paediatric every since he came to this world. For any reason if we couldn’t visit her, she always replied on call or message. When my son had covid and post covid (MIS-C) she handled it pretty intelligently and always gave the right advice, Be it tests or getting him admitted in hospital on priority . 
Thank you always ma’am. Keep growing and helping the lil angels.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I had consulted her at her clinic and online as well. *** ** *** **** ** ********* ****** *** extremely caring.  During the pandemic I have consulted her twice online. If you are looking for someone who is as caring as a mother please consult her. She doesn't treat your child as a case study but takes genuine interest in curing them.

review: doctor has been really a gr8 help to my  little kid who was suffering with stomach flu and body ache with mild fever... in this current scenario didn't want to go for physical consultation and take her out of the house.. I consulted Dr. tina goal for video consultation and she was a gr8 help to me.. very polite and kind.. helped me out with a prescription post understanding my issue and after 1 dose only my kid shown improvement.. plus she was kind to respond to all my queries patiently.... thank you doc for all your support.... we really need doctors like you...hats off to a health worker like you for young kids in this scenario...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor did not even care to share any prescription after Consultation , no food chart for baby even after asking. Tried to end the call as was in real hurry
reply_text:
I can understand your frustration on not getting the false medical leave certificate that you wanted from me . I can also understand that you felt that I was trying to end that call in a hurry as I was getting really uncomfortable with your demand. 
Regarding the prescription: If you did not receive the prescription due to any glitch(inspite of me having sent it), all you needed to do was to ask for a duplicate prescription and it would have been sent.

review: Found a very friendly doctor,  would surely visit her again and recommend too for others..she explained us well and was patient towards listening to the issues my child is facing.

review: *** ** *** **** **** ****** ** ******* Her fees are very high. Once I visited her as my 1 year baby was very serious, she was so arrogant and asked me to go to another doctor. She never help on time ******* *** **** **** **********
reply_text:
Doctors are also human , my mom was sick and admitted in hospital.. still i was responding to all calls and referred as required. We give free services to poor patients and those  in defence services of our country. Consultation fee has been displayed on all possible platforms. I don’t want to use any offensive words 🙏🏻
Wish u good health

review:
Since my baby is born till date (now he is 4.6 yrs old), i am visiting to Dr. Tina for every health related issue of my baby.
She is an amazing pediatrician,
In beginning I tried to consult to other drs for normal viral issues but my baby was not cured , finally I had to visit to Dr. Tina, and in just one sitting my baby got well.
I would recommend every parent to consult her if your baby faces any issues. 
Thank you Dr.  for your wonderful services and practice.
